[DQC.US.0133.9832] The filer has reported a value for the element us-gaap:Assets with a value of 18,000 using the axis ScheduleOfEquityMethodInvestmentEquityMethodInvesteeNameAxis. This axis must be not be used when reporting a value for us-gaap:Assets. The filer should use the axis EquityMethodInvestmentNonconsolidatedInvesteeAxis without the axis ScheduleOfEquityMethodInvestmentEquityMethodInvesteeNameAxis. Please refer to the FASB implementation guide on Dimensional Modeling for Disclosures of Consolidated and Nonconsolidated Entities on the FASB website.
The properties of this us-gaap:Assets fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:EquityMethodInvestmentNonconsolidatedInvesteeAxis=bli:OpteraTherapeuticsCorpMember, srt:ScheduleOfEquityMethodInvestmentEquityMethodInvesteeNameAxis=bli:OpteraTherapeuticsCorpMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9832 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1689657/000168965722000006/bli-20211231.htm 4

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:SalesTypeLeaseLeaseIncome has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:SalesTypeLeaseIncomeComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:SalesTypeLeaseLeaseIncome is included.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:SalesTypeLeaseLeaseIncome Value : 2,700,000 Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -5
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1689657/000168965722000006/bli-20211231.htm 4
